title: Something Like Treason: Disloyal American Soldiers & the Plot to Bring World War II Home
description: Not everyone in America was rooting for America in World War II. "Something Like Treason‚Äù is the true story of a group of pro-German American soldiers who conspired to bring the war to the United States. The domestic terrorism threat, and polarization still resonate today.They help two German POWs escape, are caught, court-martialed, convicted and given long sentences. One was sentenced to hang. Ten years later, they are successful businessmen.
author: William Sonn
